articles.title: Microsoft’s longtime CMO Chris Capossela to depart | News - Campaign Asia
articles.description: CEO Satya Nadella said ‘this is the right time’ for a new CMO to shepherd the company through its AI evolution.
articles.content: Microsoft’s longtime chief marketing officer Chris Capossela is leaving the company after more than three decades to make room for a new leader to shepherd the company through its artificial intellig… [+2906 chars]

articles.title: Modi, Egypt President discuss West Asia turmoil amid Israeli offensive in Gaza - Hindustan Times
